oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preparations for Expanding the Science Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Construction; Cooper-Wilson Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Expanding Christian Brothers' Science Center into Cooper-Wilson Hall required a lot of groundwork. Construction equipment moved along a path next to the softball field. The Nolan Engineering Center in visible on the right.
